title: Global Soft Drinks Packaging Market - Market Trends and Forecasts (2015 - 2020)
content:
LONDON , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Soft Drinks is the second most consumed drink after water, with plastic being the most used material for soft drinks packaging. In 2014, the volume of soft drinks market expanded by 3.5% whereas the sales revenue crossed $800 billion , worldwide. Increasing population, rapid urbanization and rising disposable income had led to increase in demand for soft drinks products across the world. 

Packaging plays an important role in soft drinks market. It is one of the most dynamic industry with ever-evolving consumer preferences and perception towards packaging. Efficient packaging solutions offer benefits like ease of use, disposability and enhanced user experience. These benefits has led to growth in demand of packaging solutions for soft drinks segment. The other trend which is augmenting the demand for packaging solutions is new and innovative products, which helps manufacturers to enhance their brand visibility, while offering product differentiation. 
   
The Global Soft Drinks Packaging Market is projected to witness a CAGR of 4.01% over the forecast period. Increasing disposable income of middle income group, rapid urbanization and packaging innovations are the key factors driving the soft drink packaging market. Additionally, increase in soft drinks consumption in Asia Pacific and Middle East & Africa will further augment the demand for soft drinks packaging solutions. 

In current scenario, Asia Pacific holds immense opportunities for market players owing to growing number of soft drinks consumers in the region. Large population base with increasing disposable income, low cost of production with the availability of inexpensive technical labor is expected to further drive the soft drinks market in the region, thereby providing impetus to packaging industry. 

However, emergence of local/regional and private label brands across different regions will lead to increased competition among global manufacturers. Adoption of Innovative packaging will be the major trend, opening gateway of opportunities for the manufactures to increase their foothold across the globe. 

Some of the market players mentioned in the report are Pactiv, Amcor, Genpak, Graham Packaging, Ball Corporation, Tetra Pak International and Nuconic Packaging.
